description: Core database operations for creating, reading, updating, and deleting articles in the news database

required_params.name: article_id
required_params.description: Unique article identifier (required for read, update, delete)

optional_params.name: tags
optional_params.description: Array of tag strings for categorization

error_codes.ARTICLE_NOT_FOUND: I couldn't find that article. Could you specify the title or describe which article you mean?
error_codes.DUPLICATE_TITLE: An article with a similar title already exists. Would you like to create it with a different title, or update the existing one?
error_codes.MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELD: I need more information to create the article. What should the article be about?
error_codes.DATABASE_ERROR: Something went wrong while saving the article. Please try again, or let me know if you need help.

usage_notes: Always default new articles to 'draft' status unless user explicitly requests 'published'
Auto-generate slug from title if not provided
Auto-generate excerpt from first 1-2 sentences if not provided
Return full article object after create/update operations
For update operations, only modify fields provided in params (partial updates)
